tool_description: Real-time, data-driven and transparent ESG scores for over 20,000 companies
name: GaiaLens ESG Scores
title: GaiaLens ESG Scores

api_list.name: getESGScores
api_list.description: This API provides real-time Environmental, Social, Governance and Overall scores for companies on a scale of 0 to 100. In addition to this, the API also provides other relevant metrics like Global Rank, Industry Rank and more.
